sentence: We were able to relax at the pool where the staff was also very accommodating
Daphe and her Wheels staff took care of all of our cars while delivering friendly service
The hotel is well located and the staff is friendly and service oriented
The hotel is to big to give good service
Nicole at the front desk is wonderful

I do Stay at W Fort Lauderdale frequently almost once a month for three days I just have to say I am a big fan of W Hotel world wide and I Love the Fort Lauderdale Location it has a wonderful staff supper friendly and attentive Rooms are great so as the amenities
We did park a car at the hotel and while there is a nominal charge the valets like everyone of the staff we encountered were very friendly and attentive even offering bottled water
I was there on the last day and the food was good and service very fast
The weather was perfect and the hotel and staff were simply amazing
Every single employee made me and my family feel like the only people staying there
Finlay you can tell there is a problem when the staff look even perplexed by the upgraded rooms or agree it is rather badit is all a bit hit and miss seams to be the general feeling from guests
The staff was nice but not solution oriented or knowledgeable about the building
Customer service was rude and not very accommodating and placed us in a room across from construction
He should win employee of the monthThe waiter at the steakhouse in the hotel even had fresh warm cookies delivered to our room after midnight because it was our wedding anniversary
But staying here on the third night and I have to say I am not impressed with the service

Low Quality W even Lower Customer Service
